description: Designed to accompany you in the wilderness, the supportive, multi-purpose XA Wild GTX provides the ideal balance between comfort and protection. The Contagrip® outsole offers durable traction in any conditions, the Gore-Tex membrane keeps your feet dry and the optimized 3D chassis gives you extra stability on longer, more unpredictable outings.
name: Salomon XA Wild GTX - Mens
